item.title: How to install IRAF and PyRAF on a M1/M2 (Apple Silicon) Mac?
item.description: This tutorial is for installing IRAF Community Distribution and PyRAF on a M1/M2 (Apple Silicon) Mac. The following steps are tested on Mac OS Sonoma 14.

item.title: Local port forwarding examples
item.description: For more information, please see this SSH tutorial. 1. Forward agnkiaa:9000 to localhost:8080 The webpage running on agnkiaa:9000 cannot be accessed from remote clients.

item.title: Create and manage SSH keys for authentication to a Linux server

item.title: How to install and initiate IRAF in Ubuntu/Mac OS [deprecated]
item.description: Note: This article is deprecated. Please refer to the new version for the latest tutorial. 0. Introduction to IRAF IRAF (Image Reduction and Analysis Facility) is a general purpose software system for the reduction and analysis of astronomical data.

item.title: Extend disk volume with Ubuntu LVM
item.description: Be careful with your disk when reading this note and similar ones. Think twice before you take action. Introduction to LVM LVM (Logical Volume Manager) is a powerful tool for logical volume management on Linux systems.
